name: Neon Tracer
description:
Neon Tracer is an arcade game where you race amongst pursuing droids and blazing guns while trying to complete a grid of squares. A set-up reminiscent of the 1980's games. Each of the one hundred levels are unique and you are sure to be in for a blast making your way through the different mazes.

Steal a heart and gain an extra life, fetch the double arrow for additional speed, move through the hour glass to freeze time or enter god mode by catching a falling star. But in order to prevail you need to move fast with finesse as well as conquer by being clever. 

Try out Neon Tracer today - a true nostalgic flashback and treat for fans of retro games!
